T02D3478:128a-1: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na s'a dha na kalpa /
T02D3478:128a-3: gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs cho ga dang bcas pa /
T02D3478:128a-4: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3478:128a-5: pus mo'i lha nga sar btsugs phyag g-yas ral gri bsnams //
T02D3478:128a-6: cig shos phyag ni khu tshur sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams //
T02D3478:128a-7: sku lus sra mkhregs gtum zhing 'bar ba khro ba'i spyan //
T02D3478:128a-8: bgegs 'joms mi g-yo srid pa'i bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzad //
T02D3478:128a-9: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02D3478:128a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'dren pa rnams //
T02D3478:128a-11: de rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D3478:128a-12: me tog la sogs blo yis mchod //
T02D3478:128b-0: sdug bsngal rnams bltas @128b bskyab pa'i phyir //
T02D3478:128b-1: bdag gi lus nyid dbul bar bgyi //
T02D3478:128b-2: sngags pas dge ba spel ba'i phyir //
T02D3478:128b-3: sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bgyi //
T02D3478:128b-4: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang sems tshogs //
T02D3478:128b-5: slob dang mi slob sems can gyi //
T02D3478:128b-6: bsod nams rang bzhin ma lus pa //
T02D3478:128b-7: de la rjes su yi rang ngo//
T02D3478:128b-8: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02D3478:128b-9: rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par bsten //
T02D3478:128b-10: tshad med pa yi gnas bzhi po //
T02D3478:128b-11: rim pa ji bzhin bsgom par bya //
T02D3478:128b-12: mtshan nyid dang bral stong pa nyid //
T02D3478:128b-13: rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med //
T02D3478:128b-14: smon lam las kyang rnam grol ba'i //
T02D3478:128b-15: ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin bsgom //
T02D3478:128b-16: sna tshogs padma nyi ma'i dbus //
T02D3478:128b-17: h'um yig las byung bzhugs par bsgom //
T02D3478:128b-18: dpa' bo spyan gnyis dmar po ste //
T02D3478:128b-19: phyag gnyis rin chen cod pan can //
T02D3478:128b-20: mgon po sdig pa 'phral du spang //
T02D3478:128b-21: ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su skong //
T02D3478:128b-22: zar ma'i me tog lta bu'i mdog / sangs rgyas dri med 'od zer 'gyed //
T02D3478:128b-23: mche bas mchu ni nges par mnan //
T02D3478:128b-24: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3478:128b-25: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste //
T02D3478:128b-26: pus mo g-yon pa sa la btsugs //
T02D3478:128b-27: phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yi //
T02D3478:128b-28: dpal ldan khro bo gtum po che //
T02D3478:128b-29: 'jigs byed chen po zur gyis gzigs ;
T02D3478:128b-30: / mi bzad 'jigs par byed pa po //
T02D3478:128b-31: ye shes sems dpa' gzi brjid che //
T02D3478:128b-32: dam tshig sems dpa' mtshungs par blta //
T02D3478:128b-33: sngags pas de yi thugs ka ru //
T02D3478:128b-34: sa bon mtshan ma yang dag ldan //
T02D3478:128b-35: lha yi rnam par sbyor ba yis //
T02D3478:128b-36: bsam gtan skyon sngags bzlas bya //
T02D3478:128b-37: de las gsungs pa'i dngos grub ni //
T02D3478:128b-38: the tshom med pa nyid du 'thob //
T02D3478:128b-39: de la sngags kyi rgyal po ni 'di yin te /
T02D3478:128b-40: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat //
T02D3478:128b-41: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig brjod pas /
T02D3478:128b-42: sdig pa thams cad nges par sreg cing thams cad du nges par srung ba dang /
T02D3478:128b-44: sran ma la sogs pa rnams kyis brabs na 'byung
T02D3478:128b-45: po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed do
T02D3478:128b-46: // kham phor so ma btang ba la thod le
T02D3478:128b-47: kor gyis mngon par bris nas sgo ltag la dbyangs
T02D3478:128b-48: na byis pa gsar du skyes pa rnams srung bar
T02D3478:129a-0: // byed do // spra tshil gyis gzugs sor bzhi'i tshad du byas nas @129a * //
T02D3478:129a-1: de'i snying gar bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags
T02D3478:129a-2: gro ga la mngon par bris te bcug nas de'i
T02D3478:129a-3: khar tsher ma bcug na phyir rgol ba phur bus
T02D3478:129a-5: rkang pa la btsugs na 'gro 'phro la rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3478:129a-6: snying gar btsugs na khros pa zhi bar 'gyur ro ;
T02D3478:129a-7: / mi'i rje ngar gyi phur bu'am /
T02D3478:129a-8: lcags kyi phur bu gang dang gang gis ming bzung
T02D3478:129a-9: ste lus la btab na de dang de rnam par
T02D3478:129a-11: dgra'i sgo khar sbas na brlag par 'gyur ro //
T02D3478:129a-12: khyi nag po'i thod pa la ming dang bcas pa
T02D3478:129a-13: bris nas klu'i gnas su sbas na mdzes zin par
T02D3478:129a-14: 'gyur ro ; / rabs chad kyi thod pa la
T02D3478:129a-15: sngags dang bcas te bris nas rabs chad kyi dur
T02D3478:129a-16: khrod du sbas na rabs chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D3478:129a-17: ro mtsho lkugs par sbas na thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3478:129a-18: me thab tu sbas na rims kyis 'chi'o //
T02D3478:129a-19: dur khrod kyi thal ba la mngon par bsngags nas
T02D3478:129a-20: dgra bo'i sgo glegs la btags na de skrod par
T02D3478:129a-21: 'gyur ro // ral gri la mngon par bsngags nas g-yul du zhugs na rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3478:129a-22: bya ba gang la 'jug pa na gtor ma btang na de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3478:129a-23: sngags pas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las gang
T02D3478:129a-24: dang gang 'dod ba bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par
T02D3478:129a-25: 'gyur ro // bdag gis bris las gang thob pa'i //
T02D3478:129a-26: dge bas sems can don grub cing //
T02D3478:129a-28: rdzogs pa'i byang chub snod ldan shog / gtum po
T02D3478:129a-29: chen po'i sgrub thabs cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs
